item.title: EVOS SG emerges victorious in the inaugural Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Professional League held in Singapore
item.description:
The inaugural Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Professional League in Singapore (MPL Singapore) concluded with EVOS SG claiming the S$30,000 grand prize. Source: Singtel. EVOS SG emerges victorious in the first MPL Singapore. The final playoffs, hosted at The Gym e-sports facility and streamed to a live online audience, employed a best-of-five format. EVOS SG triumphed with a decisive 3-0 victory against RSG SG. This win was made even more significant by Chong “Soul” Ru Chyi’s return to the team as a player after serving as their coach...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/evos-sg-emerges-victorious-in-the-inaugural-mobile-legends-bang-bang-professional-league-held-in-singapore/

item.title: Singtel and Riot Games Southeast Asia introduce the world's first gaming bundles for League of Legends: Wild Rift that are zero-rated
item.description:
Singtel has teamed up with Riot Games Southeast Asia to launch the first-ever zero-rated gaming bundles for League of Legends: Wild Rift. Zero-rating means data used for a specific activity won’t count towards a user’s data limit and won’t incur extra charges. League of Legends: Wild Rift, a five-versus-five mobile multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA), brings the popular PC game League of Legends to mobile devices. These new RiotGO and RiotGO+ bundles, available exclusively for Singtel postpaid mobile customers, offer unlimited data-free gameplay and up to S$40 worth of in-game content for Wild Rift...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-and-riot-games-southeast-asia-introduce-the-world-s-first-gaming-bundles-for-league-of-legends-wild-rift-that-are-zero-rated/

item.title: Players from Manchester United and FC Barcelona will be participating in the GET Riyadh 2023 football competition
item.description:
The Global Esports Tour (GET), a professional esports series by the Global Esports Federation, will commence its third season on August 26-27, 2023. This season’s launch event will take place at Boulevard Riyadh City, as a featured part of the Gamers8 festival. Source: Global Esports Federation. Poster for GET Riyadh 2023. KONAMI’s eFootball 2023 will be the primary game featured, with a prize pool totaling US$50,000. Professional football players, Lotfi Derradji and Kilyan Katou Judex Faucheux of Manchester United, alongside Alejandro Alguacil Seguira and Saul Adrian Chavez Saucedo of FC Barcelona, will participate alongside esports players...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/players-from-manchester-united-and-fc-barcelona-will-be-participating-in-the-get-riyadh-2023-football-competition/
